text:
The #COVID19 Dashboard has been updated: https://t.co/XhspoyTG79

On Thurs 01 April, 4,479 new cases and 51 deaths within 28 days of a positive test were reported across the UK.

31,147,444 people have received the 1st dose of a #vaccine, and 4,513,458 have received a 2nd dose. https://t.co/H31T1qdtTS
